meanings.definition: A weightlifting exercise in which a barbell is lifted off the ground to hip level, then lowered back down.
meanings.sent1: She loves doing deadlifts at the gym to strengthen her muscles.
meanings.sent2: The coach demonstrated the proper form for deadlifts to the new weightlifters.
meanings.sent3: After a few deadlifts, he felt like a superhero ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the barbell hitting the ground echoed through the gym after each set of deadlifts.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of deadlifts made her feel powerful and invincible.

meanings.definition: The act of performing deadlifts as a form of strength training.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to daily deadlifts paid off with increased strength and endurance.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes include deadlifts in their workout routines to build muscle mass.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends joked that their deadlifts competition was the highlight of the week.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fitness, deadlifts are like a secret weapon for overall strength.
meanings.sent5: The satisfaction of completing a set of deadlifts fueled his motivation to keep going.
